person_description: Elderly man with wild white hair, prominent mustache, deep-set eyes, wearing casual attire
person_biography: German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity. Winner of the 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics. One of the most influential scientists of the 20th century.
quote_text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.

person_description: Elderly man with wild white hair, prominent mustache, deep-set eyes, wearing casual attire
person_biography: German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity. Winner of the 1921 Nobel Prize in Physics. One of the most influential scientists of the 20th century.
quote_text: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.

person_description: Tall, lean man with sharp features, piercing eyes, aquiline nose, wearing a deerstalker cap and Inverness cape
person_biography: Fictional consulting detective created by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Known for his logical reasoning, forensic skills, and deductive methods.
quote_text: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
